question: Match the pollen-related facts with their correct NCERT-based statements:
column_II: Highly variable, depends on temperature and humidity
matches: Pollen grain viability duration–Highly variable, depends on temperature and humidity
Viability in rice and wheat–30 minutes
Viability in Rosaceae, Leguminoseae, Solanaceae–Several months
Pollen bank usage–Used in crop breeding programmes
answer: Pollen grain viability duration–Highly variable, depends on temperature and humidity, Viability in rice and wheat–30 minutes, Viability in Rosaceae, Leguminoseae, Solanaceae–Several months, Ultra-low temperature storage–Liquid nitrogen (-196°C), Pollen bank usage–Used in crop breeding programmes

question: Match the gynoecium-related terms with their correct NCERT-based descriptions:
answer: Monocarpellary–Single pistil, Syncarpous–Fused pistils, Apocarpous–Free pistils, Ovary–Basal bulged part of pistil, Ovules–Arise from placenta
